abstract: NFL Roundup; St Louis Rams quarterback Sam Bradford, who injured his left ankle, is still in a walking boot and will not play for at least another week; other NFL developments noted.
snippet: The quarterback is in a walking boot, and he is unlikely to play on Sunday for the 0-6 Rams.
lead_paragraph: The quarterback is in a walking boot, and he is unlikely to play on Sunday for the 0-6 Rams.

headline.main: Bradford Looks Doubtful for at Least Another Week
headline.print_headline: Bradford Looks Doubtful for at Least Another Week
headline.seo: Sam Bradford Looks Doubtful for Another Week
